rooms.name: The Crypt
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, Low A. Total shutdown.
rooms.function: Sensory deprivation. Resetting the nervous system.
rooms.input_logic: No external stimuli permitted. Light = 0. Sound = 0. Temperature = Womb.
rooms.output_logic: The only output is the gradual return to neurological baseline—the reset of cortisol, the draining of arousal.

rooms.name: The Bath
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, Low A. Liquid state.
rooms.input_logic: Heat as the only permitted energy input. No cognitive demands.
rooms.output_logic: Export of lactic acid, cortisol. The body surrenders its crystallized stress.

rooms.name: The Garden
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, Low A. Organic growth.
rooms.function: Slow observation of nature. Low stakes.
rooms.input_logic: Only biophilic stimuli permitted—green, growth, soil, sky. Complexity without urgency.
rooms.output_logic: Nervous system entrains to botanical tempo. Parasympathetic dominance emerges.

rooms.name: The Monastery Cell
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, Low A. Boredom induction.
rooms.input_logic: Zero novel stimuli. The same four walls. The same view. Same temperature.
rooms.output_logic: Tolerance levels reset. Small pleasures regain their power.

rooms.name: The Incubator
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, Low A. Passive processing.
rooms.input_logic: Problem loaded into working memory before entry, then released.
rooms.output_logic: Insight, clarity, or reframing—often upon waking or during exit.

rooms.name: The Sick Bay
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, Low A. Healing mode.
rooms.input_logic: Comfort stimuli only. Warmth, softness, nourishment. Zero demands.
rooms.output_logic: Gradual restoration of energy reserves. Permission to be weak.

rooms.name: The Hearth
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, Low A. Primordial safety.
rooms.function: Staring at fire/light to stabilize the mind.
rooms.input_logic: Fire-light (or suitable substitute) as sole visual input. Crackling or ambient sound.
rooms.output_logic: Attention anchors. The mind stops its scattered wandering. Alpha wave states emerge.

rooms.name: The Library (Quiet)
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, Low A. Passive absorption.
rooms.input_logic: Presence of books as informational potential energy. No urgent reading required.
rooms.output_logic: A sense of continuity with history. Smallness of self. Peace of the inherited.

rooms.name: The Analog Loop
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, Moderate A. Repetitive motion.
rooms.function: Soothing anxiety through knitting, vinyl, sketching.
rooms.input_logic: A simple, repetitive physical task with tactile feedback.
rooms.output_logic: Nervous system synchronizes to external rhythm. Anxiety dampens.

rooms.name: The Swamp
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, Low A. Permitted indulgence.
rooms.input_logic: Doomscrolling, junk TV, video games—whatever constitutes your personal low-value attractor.
rooms.output_logic: Craving satisfied. Resistance fatigue avoided. Clear conscience for bounded indulgence.

rooms.name: The Basecamp
rooms.input_logic: Simple, intentional consumption of preparatory substances.
rooms.output_logic: Body primed for upcoming demands. No deficits.

rooms.name: The Airlock
rooms.input_logic: State from previous room (work, home, public, private).
rooms.output_logic: Gradual acclimatization to the next room's demands.

rooms.name: The Morning Chapel
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, High A. Signal calibration.
rooms.function: Setting the trajectory. Zero external input.
rooms.input_logic: Zero external input. No news. No email. No notifications.
rooms.output_logic: Trajectory set. Values clarified. Internal compass aligned.

rooms.name: The Archive
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, High A. Storage management.
rooms.function: Categorizing the past. Freeing up RAM.
rooms.input_logic: Unprocessed experiences, notes, photos, artifacts, memories.
rooms.output_logic: Organized storage. Tags applied. Connections made. RAM freed.

rooms.name: The Map Room
rooms.input_logic: Current position, goals, obstacles, resources, trajectories.
rooms.output_logic: High-level plan. Identified leverage points. Clarified direction.

rooms.name: The Checkpoint
rooms.input_logic: Data from the past week: completed tasks, missed targets, emotional state, resource levels.
rooms.output_logic: Course corrections. Priority adjustments. Renewed commitment or strategic pivot.

rooms.name: The Waiting Room
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, High A. Forced patience.
rooms.input_logic: Time that is not yours to control. External constraint on progress.
rooms.output_logic: Patience practiced. Equanimity strengthened. Acceptance of powerlessness.

rooms.name: The Editor's Desk
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, High A. Subtractive processing.
rooms.input_logic: Raw creation—drafts, code, designs, un-reviewed work.
rooms.output_logic: Polished artifact. Tighter, cleaner, truer than before.

rooms.name: The Clean Room
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, High A. Physical order.
rooms.input_logic: Chaos—dishes, dust, clutter, disarray.
rooms.output_logic: Order—surfaces clear, tools in place, environment supporting function.

rooms.name: The Confessional
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, High A. Shadow work.
rooms.input_logic: Failures, sins, broken promises, shameful truths—the things you avoid.
rooms.output_logic: Acknowledged debt. Reduced shame. Integration of shadow.

rooms.name: The Classroom
rooms.physics_hint: Low D, High A. Structured intake.
rooms.input_logic: Curated teaching material—lectures, tutorials, courses. Not random browsing.
rooms.output_logic: Knowledge delta. Skill acquisition. Conceptual frameworks installed.

rooms.name: The Courtroom
rooms.input_logic: Unresolved choices. Competing options. Suspended judgment.
rooms.output_logic: Decision made. Uncertainty collapsed. Path committed.

rooms.name: The Post Office
rooms.input_logic: Email, Slack, messages, DMs—the inbound queue.
rooms.output_logic: Processed queue. Responses sent. Items delegated or deleted. Inbox zero (or near).

rooms.name: The Vault
rooms.input_logic: Access credentials, backup schedules, financial accounts, security hygiene.
rooms.output_logic: Updated security. Verified backups. Confirmed access. Reduced vulnerability.

rooms.name: The Cockpit
rooms.input_logic: Pre-defined task queue. Clear objectives. All resources staged.
rooms.output_logic: Code shipped. Words written. Miles covered. Maximum output per unit time.

rooms.name: The Forge
rooms.input_logic: Physical task requiring effort. Moving, lifting, building, exerting.
rooms.output_logic: Material transformed by labor. Body strengthened. Resistance overcome.

rooms.name: The Studio (Closed)
rooms.physics_hint: Internal High D, High A. Aperture.
rooms.input_logic: Internal only. Memory, imagination, prepared material. No new research.
rooms.output_logic: Original creation. Novel synthesis. The work that only you could make.

rooms.name: The Kitchen (Service)
rooms.input_logic: Multiple parallel demands with real-time synchronization requirements.
rooms.output_logic: Completed service. Plates out. Crisis managed. Flow state under pressure.

rooms.name: The Arena
rooms.input_logic: Preparation complete. Audience present. Stakes real.
rooms.output_logic: Performance delivered. Judgment received. Growth from exposure.

rooms.name: The Sprint
rooms.physics_hint: High D, High A. Time-boxed Velocity.
rooms.function: Hackathon mode. Max output, min time.
rooms.input_logic: Well-defined deliverable. Hard deadline. No scope creep.
rooms.output_logic: Artifact produced. Shipped. Done—not perfect, but *done*.

rooms.name: The Laboratory
rooms.physics_description: The Laboratory is where ideas meet reality. Unlike The Studio, which creates from imagination, The Laboratory creates experiments—structured tests that return data about what works.
rooms.equation: H_0 → {H_0 confirmed, H_0 refuted}; D_out = f(D_in, H)
rooms.input_logic: Hypothesis, test design, controlled conditions.
rooms.output_logic: Data. Not opinion—*data*. What actually happened when you tried.
rooms.evocative_quote: There are no facts, only interpretations.
rooms.evocative_description: But some interpretations are more expensive than others. The Laboratory is where you pay the cost of finding out. Here, speculation ends and experimentation begins. The room does not care about your theories. It cares about what happens when you run the code, deploy the feature, test the assumption. The Laboratory humbles the arrogant and rewards the curious.

constraints.name: The Hypothesis First
constraints.description: You must enter with a specific question. 'What if I...'

constraints.name: The Measurement Mandate
constraints.description: You must know what data you're collecting and how.

constraints.name: The Acceptance of Results
constraints.description: The Laboratory's verdict is final. You do not argue with outcomes.

altar.name: The Test Environment
altar.description: Sandbox, staging server, prototype, controlled conditions.

altar.name: The Instrumentation
altar.description: Logs, metrics, sensors. What measures the result.

altar.name: The Lab Notebook
altar.description: Record of hypotheses, methods, results. Science demands records.

liturgy.entry: State the hypothesis: 'I believe X will cause Y.' Write it down. Design the test.
liturgy.step_1: Run the experiment. Do not interfere mid-test. Let reality answer.
liturgy.step_2: Observe results. Did the hypothesis hold? Record the data, not your preference.
liturgy.exit: Document the findings. Say: 'I now know something I did not before.' Proceed with the new knowledge.

trap.leak: Cherry-picking data. Running the experiment until it gives the desired result.
trap.result: False Confidence. You believe something works because you only counted the successes. The Laboratory was corrupted. Your next decision rests on polluted data.

rooms.name: The Cathedral
rooms.function: Listening to complex music. Aligning with order.
rooms.input_logic: High-complexity, high-structure music. Active listening, not background noise.
rooms.output_logic: Internal state aligned with beauty. Order felt, not thought. Inspiration for structured creation.

rooms.name: The Hive
rooms.input_logic: Presence in a shared work environment. Others focusing nearby.
rooms.output_logic: Increased personal focus. Reduced temptation to defect. Borrowed discipline.

rooms.name: The Dojo
rooms.input_logic: Isolated skills. Known weaknesses. Targeted repetition.
rooms.output_logic: Automatic competence. Skill transferred from conscious to unconscious.

rooms.name: The War Room
rooms.input_logic: Crisis signal. Broken production. Existential threat. Time pressure.
rooms.output_logic: Resolution. Problem solved, contained, or triaged. Return from emergency footing.

rooms.name: The Altar of Work
rooms.input_logic: Work that is ready (or ready enough) to ship.
rooms.output_logic: Published, deployed, sent, submitted. Irrevocable transmission.

rooms.name: The Intersection
rooms.physics_hint: High D, Low A. Overwhelming input.
rooms.input_logic: Overwhelming sensory and informational inflow. No curation.
rooms.output_logic: Forced expansion of bandwidth. Humility before complexity. Serendipitous encounter.

rooms.name: The Nightclub
rooms.input_logic: Loud rhythmic music. Darkness. Physical movement.
rooms.output_logic: Egodeath-lite. Ecstatic release. The controlled loosening of identity boundaries.

rooms.name: The Mosh Pit
rooms.input_logic: Pent-up aggression, rage, physical energy demanding outlet.
rooms.output_logic: Cathartic discharge. The beast fed and satisfied.

rooms.name: The Casino
rooms.input_logic: Capital (money, time, reputation) placed at risk.
rooms.output_logic: Win or loss. The felt experience of uncertainty and consequence.

rooms.name: The Wilderness
rooms.input_logic: Unmarked territory. Natural environment. Self as sole navigator.
rooms.output_logic: Reactivated animal sense. Trust in body-wisdom. Awe before the untamed.

rooms.name: The Improv Stage
rooms.input_logic: A prompt, a partner, or pure impulse.
rooms.output_logic: Generative output uncensored. Quantity over quality. Ideas born without filter.

rooms.name: The Sandbox
rooms.input_logic: A new domain. No prior competence.
rooms.output_logic: Renewed beginner's mind. Remember what learning feels like.

rooms.name: The Feast
rooms.input_logic: Rich food, strong drink, loud talk, sensory abundance.
rooms.output_logic: Satiation. Gratitude. Memory of pleasure that sustains through leaner times.

rooms.name: The Comedy Club
rooms.input_logic: Curated comedy. Stand-up, satire, absurdist content.
rooms.output_logic: Perspective shift. Released tension. The seriousness broken.

rooms.name: The Storm Chaser
rooms.input_logic: Extreme weather, vast landscapes, oceanic power—nature in dominance.
rooms.output_logic: Ego diminished. Perspective expanded. The small self remembered.

rooms.name: The Market
rooms.function: Flea market/Twitter. Finding signal in noise.
rooms.input_logic: Unstructured noise—vendors, posts, conversations. No curation.
rooms.output_logic: Discovered signal. The rare find. The unexpected connection.

rooms.name: The Void (Active)
rooms.function: Staring into the abyss. Existential dread.
rooms.input_logic: Mortality contemplation. Nihilism. The unanswerable questions.
rooms.output_logic: Either collapse or integration. The existential immune system is tested.

rooms.name: The River
rooms.input_logic: A shared space with others. No conversation. White noise of humanity.
rooms.output_logic: Reduced loneliness without social demand. Focus boosted by ambient presence.

rooms.name: The Salon
rooms.input_logic: Your ideas, exposed to adversarial scrutiny.
rooms.output_logic: Refined positions. Discovered weaknesses. Stronger understanding.

rooms.name: The Campfire
rooms.input_logic: Personal stories. Honest sharing. The removal of masks.
rooms.output_logic: Deep connection. Understood. Known.

rooms.name: The Negotiating Table
rooms.input_logic: Conflicting interests. Resources to be allocated. Positions to be reconciled.
rooms.output_logic: Agreement or principled disagreement. Path forward, or clarity that there is none.

rooms.name: The Piazza
rooms.input_logic: The passing parade of humanity. Fashion, gait, drama, connection.
rooms.output_logic: Renewed appreciation for the variety of being. Distance from one's own narrative.

rooms.name: The Broadcast
rooms.input_logic: Message crafted and prepared. Medium selected.
rooms.output_logic: Signal transmitted. Ideas planted in unseen minds.

rooms.name: The Reception
rooms.input_logic: A gathering of strangers or acquaintances. An agenda of opportunity.
rooms.output_logic: Many surface connections. A few leads for deeper follow-up.

rooms.name: The Confidant's Room
rooms.input_logic: Time with the trusted one. The full, unfiltered self.
rooms.output_logic: Deep connection. Understanding. Counsel that matters.

rooms.name: The Mentor's Office
rooms.input_logic: A mentor with knowledge to share, or a student seeking guidance.
rooms.output_logic: Accelerated learning. Shortened learning curves. Transmitted wisdom.

rooms.name: The Team Huddle
rooms.input_logic: Team members with individual contexts, agendas, blockers.
rooms.output_logic: Synchronized state. Shared understanding. Coordinated action.

rooms.name: The Public Square
rooms.physics_hint: Medium D, High A. Civic Duty.
rooms.input_logic: Civic opportunity—election, community service, public comment.
rooms.output_logic: Contribution to the commons. Sense of belonging to something larger.

rooms.name: The Mask
rooms.input_logic: A role to play, an avatar to inhabit, a persona to try on.
rooms.output_logic: Expanded behavioral range. Self-knowledge through contrast.

rooms.name: The Bridge
rooms.input_logic: Current state: energy level, mood, backlog, priorities.
rooms.output_logic: Decision about which room to enter next. Self-location in the system.

rooms.name: The Lighthouse
rooms.function: Looking at the future. Beaming light.
rooms.input_logic: Present identity, values, vision.
rooms.output_logic: Long-term direction. The purpose that orients daily choices.

rooms.name: The Museum
rooms.input_logic: Raw memories, past events, historical self.
rooms.output_logic: Coherent narrative. Understanding of the journey. Identity grounded in history.

rooms.name: The Camera Obscura
rooms.function: Pure observation. 'I am not the wave'.
rooms.input_logic: Any experience—thought, emotion, sensation—currently arising.
rooms.output_logic: Detached awareness. "This is happening" without "This is me."

rooms.name: The Simulator
rooms.input_logic: An upcoming situation with uncertainty.
rooms.output_logic: Pre-computed responses. Reduced surprise. Stoic equanimity.

rooms.name: The Satellite
rooms.input_logic: Travel, relocation, or meditative distance.
rooms.output_logic: Clarified priorities. Things that seemed important shrink. Things that seemed small grow.

rooms.name: The Dream Journal
rooms.input_logic: Dream content, captured immediately upon waking.
rooms.output_logic: Insight into hidden concerns, desires, fears. Subconscious patterns revealed.

rooms.name: The Tarot / I-Ching
rooms.input_logic: A question or situation where you feel stuck.
rooms.output_logic: A new angle. Not "the answer"—but an angle you hadn't considered.

rooms.name: The Silent Retreat
rooms.input_logic: Days of silence. No communication, no obligation, no content.
rooms.output_logic: Deep recalibration. Neurological reset. Clarity unavailable otherwise.

rooms.name: The Eulogy
rooms.input_logic: The fact of mortality. The question: how do I want to be remembered?
rooms.output_logic: Urgency. Clarified priorities. Wasted time exposed.

rooms.name: The Totem
rooms.input_logic: A physical object held in the hand.
rooms.output_logic: Grounded presence. Reduced dissociation. The body remembered.

rooms.name: The Exit
rooms.function: The door. The ability to leave.
rooms.input_logic: The feeling of being trapped, obligated, without options.
rooms.output_logic: Remembered agency. The knowledge that you can leave—even if you choose to stay.
